overview: David is just breaking up and seeing his pitiful situation, his four friends - Once, Andi, Eddie, and Piyu - introduce him to the exciting singles life in Jakarta. Once, Andi and Eddie all have bitter romantic experiences so they choose to be single. On the other hand, Piyu, who falls in love and has a fiancee, lives only for love.
title: Gue Kapok Jatuh Cinta
